BBK01.SU0005: Lending rates of banks / Current account credit of EUR 500,000 and more but less than EUR 2.5 million / Lowest rate of spread

General: Up to December 2001, loans of DM 1 million and more but less than DM 5 million. Since January 1991 the rates of banks in the new Länder have been included in the interest rate survey. The spread is ascertained by eliminating the reports in the top 5% and the bottom 5% of the interest rate range.
